name: Circle Dot Fights
description:
Version 0.1 (future versions might not be compatible with your save from this version)
You play a nameless person of unknown gender and ethnicity in one of the planes that was build which happens to be capable of doing Loopings and Loopings only. 

Collect all green dots and avoid Bombs (and in future updates poisonous fogs and enemies).  There are currently seven levels, future Updates will add more.

Controls:

  • You control everything with mouse
  • Click and drag the mouse to any location to draw a loop in which your red air plane will fly
  • Try to catch the green points without letting your plane hit any of the gray bombs
  • Combos and a higher radius will increase the points you will get with each flight
  • In the level select you can save and go to the shop to upgrade.

Credits:
